argument.description: The first date used to calculate the number of months between.
The second date used to calculate the number of months between.

returnType: The MONTHS_BETWEEN function returns a numeric value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL MONTHS_BETWEEN function returns the number of months between date1 and date2.
sample: MONTHS_BETWEEN (TO_DATE ('2003/01/01', 'yyyy/mm/dd'), TO_DATE ('2003/03/14', 'yyyy/mm/dd') ) MONTHS_BETWEEN (TO_DATE ('2003/07/01', 'yyyy/mm/dd'), TO_DATE ('2003/03/14', 'yyyy/mm/dd') ) MONTHS_BETWEEN (TO_DATE ('2003/07/02', 'yyyy/mm/dd'), TO_DATE ('2003/07/02', 'yyyy/mm/dd') ) MONTHS_BETWEEN (TO_DATE ('2003/08/02', 'yyyy/mm/dd'), TO_DATE ('2003/06/02', 'yyyy/mm/dd') )
